tool_description: Manages version control for knowledge base articles, creating snapshots, tracking changes, enabling rollbacks, and maintaining version history for content management and audit purposes.

article_id.description: ID of the article to manage versions for

operation.description: Version operation to perform: create_snapshot, rollback, view_history, or compare_versions

version_notes.description: Notes describing the changes or reason for version operation

target_version.description: Target version for rollback or comparison operations

compare_with_version.description: Version to compare with when using compare_versions operation

max_versions_to_keep.description: Maximum number of versions to retain (5-50)

error_messages: Article not found: The specified article_id does not exist.
Invalid operation: Use one of [create_snapshot, rollback, view_history, compare_versions].
Version not found: The specified target_version or compare_with_version does not exist.
Invalid version limit: max_versions_to_keep must be between 5 and 50.
Rollback failed: Cannot rollback to the specified version due to conflicts.
Insufficient permissions: User does not have permission to perform this version operation.
usage: Specify article_id and operation to manage article versions. Use version_notes for documentation, target_version for rollbacks, and compare_with_version for comparisons. Set max_versions_to_keep to control version retention.

operation_status.description: Status of the version management operation

current_version.description: Current active version of the article

version_list.description: List of available versions for the article

changes_summary.description: Summary of changes made or differences found
